title: Makes provisions regarding instructions to grand juries and charges to the jury
summary: Provides for the preparation of written instructions by the chief administrator of the courts to be presented to each grand jury preliminary to assumption of their duties regarding the independent functions of the grand jury; provides that the court may provide a written summary of the charge to the jury.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the judiciary law, in relation to instructions to grand juries preliminary to assumption of their duties and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the charge to the jury
